info.author: mlinar
info.description:
This program is an automated grammar that for now works on morphological level. 
The user can provide basic forms of words (nominative case or infinitive) and 
the program will produce the declension or verbal forms. In this version 
gradual introduction of definitions form Whitaker’s Latin dictionary project 
WORDS.
info.keywords: latin, declension, conjugation, linguistics, grammar, morphology
info.name: pyLatinam
info.summary: Declension, conjugation and analysis in Latin language.
info.html_description: This program is an automated grammar that for now works on morphological level. The user can provide basic forms of words (nominative case or infinitive) and the program will produce the declension or verbal forms. In this version gradual introduction of definitions form Whitaker’s Latin dictionary project WORDS.
